title: Should listen to FSOURCEATTACHED and FSOURCEDETACHED java deltas
description: The current behavior is that when the attached source of a jar is changed, a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta is fired. This is incorrect as it should be firing a (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta instead. Consequently, the UI reacts by closing the class file editors that are open on this jar, which is appropriate for a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta. However, when I tried to fix the delta to be a (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta, the UI did not react.
OB: Currently, when the attached source of a jar is changed, a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta is fired.
EB: The expected behavior is that a (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta should be fired when the attached source of a jar is changed.
